meanings.definition: Marked or decorated with a band or bands.
meanings.sent1: The banded watch had colorful stripes on its strap.
meanings.sent2: The banded scarf had alternating blue and white stripes.
meanings.sent3: The banded socks looked like a rainbow wrapped around the feet.
meanings.sent4: The banded flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The banded ribbon added a festive touch to the gift.

meanings.definition: Formed into a band or bands.
meanings.sent1: The banded belt held up his pants securely.
meanings.sent2: The banded bracelet was made of intertwined metal rings.
meanings.sent3: The banded hair tie kept her ponytail in place all day.
meanings.sent4: The banded ring sparkled on her finger under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The banded collar on the shirt added a stylish touch.

meanings.definition: Grouped together in a band or bands.
meanings.sent1: The banded group of musicians played harmoniously together.
meanings.sent2: The banded team of friends won the relay race.
meanings.sent3: The banded flock of birds flew in perfect formation across the sky.
meanings.sent4: The banded students sat together in the front row of the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The banded family enjoyed a picnic in the park.
